author: Scott Russell PhotoFilmz
comment: Need a refund. Tried to open up app after downloading to my phone. It won't even open up. Does nothing. Developer please respond to give solution or refund.

reply.author: SeenApps
reply.content: Please get a refund directly from the store. You should have a link in your confirmation email.

author: Aniket D
comment: Dear developer, I have a fossil Q Marshall. The pitch and roll on the Artificial Horizon does not work. I request you to modify the app. I tried selecting either pitch or roll but it did not change. Otherwise a nice app. Really happy with this . Thanks

author: Emmanuel Titus
comment: Hai dear can you please make this same watch face for Samsung gear s3, because I like this cockpit watch face too much. I buy this S3 Gear because of this cockpit watch face. But cannot install. Please Thanks and best regards  Emmanuel Titus

reply.author: SeenApps
reply.content: Gear watches use Tizen which is not developer friendly. The effort of porting our faces to this Operating System outweigh the benefits by orders of magnitude. Like you, I love S3 hardware, but I think they have it all wrong on the software.

author: Alex Christian
comment: Graphics are a little jittery, but really fun still.
title: Pretty, but laggy

author: robert judge
comment: can't find it on either my phone or the watch

reply.author: SeenApps
reply.content: Please don't use ratings for support inquiries.

comment: I love this beautiful watch face

author: Kenneth Gibbs
comment: Appeals to the pilot in me

author: Gary Lovell
comment: I just want to stare at it constantly but I guess I should listen to the passenger screams and focus on flying the plane
title: Love it!!

author: Reece Williams
comment: Had alot of watchfaces since Androidwear was launched but this one is the most fun to use. Check out the developers other apps as well.
title: Best Watchface

comment: I love it and it is just awesome

author: Dean R English
comment: It looked great until the screen dimmed....only the top dial turns green against a black back ground. If you have OCD then having uncentered dials will annoy you. Had the refund and uninstall

reply.author: SeenApps
reply.content: Hello Dieter. I don't understand the issue. Can you please drop us a note at support@seenapps.com

title: Cool until dim

comment: Does not allow you to have a refund.

reply.author: SeenApps
reply.content: You can get refunds directly with Google Play. We are not involved in that process.

title: Purchased it but want a refund.
